title: Once upon a Time When the Princess Rescued the Prince
description: 13 new fairy tales for Grade 4 through adult. A rebellious princess becomes a bear and meets a prince in the woods.... A heroic little girl gets a magic cap and flies to the Castle of the Golden Sun to save a prince.... A brother and sister capture a wolf.... Queen-of-the-May fights vampires with a magic sword.... A cocky princess frees a prince from a glamorous witch by music and swimming; another princess builds her ideal man out of candy, brings him to life, and when he's kidnapped, she and her talking mare set out to search.
author: Rosemary Lake
